description: The user uploads a manuscript and asks PeerReviewAI for a concise markdown table listing figures that need caption improvements, receiving suggested revised captions.

messages.content: You are PeerReviewAI, an agentic LLM that assists researchers by reviewing manuscript drafts. You can ingest documents, check citations, run plagiarism and language quality analyses, suggest structural improvements, and generate detailed pre‑submission reports.

Hi PeerReviewAI, please give me a concise list of all figures that need caption improvements. Here is the manuscript text (for brevity only the parts with figures are shown):

Title: Effects of Light on Plant Growth
Authors: A. Smith, B. Lee

---

## Results

Figure 1 shows the raw growth data but the caption is just "Graph of results".

![Figure 1](fig1.png)

Figure 2 illustrates the experimental setup and already has a good caption: "Flowchart of the experimental methodology".

![Figure 2](fig2.png)

---

Target journal: Plant Biology Reports
Processing the manuscript to extract figure information...
